title: Fei Siong Group - Life at Fei Siong Group
html:
Skip to content
Home
About
Brands
Careers
News
Contact Us
Search for:
 
Why Fei Siong
Life at Fei Siong

We give the best of ourselves to make a difference in your life!

We believe that a great workplace creates the best experience for our customers. That is why we strive to do what we do best – cooking up traditional hawker fare that continues to bring smiles to our customers’ faces. While working hard to drive the future of Singapore’s food industry, Fei Siong Group has fostered a culture of trust and collaboration where employees embrace respect, autonomy, and ownership over their responsibilities.

Every employee matters. When our employees have a personal stake in their endeavours, they take matters into their own hands with pride. Fei Siong Group makes sure that there is always a clear vision for growth, for both employees and the business. This way, our employees’ success will be our success.

Working for Corporate
Head Office

Our headquarters are based in Singapore. Whatever role you play, you will be a part of a company that believes in nurturing its employees to reach their full potential.

View Openings
Working at Retail
Store Roles

Each of our outlets has its own dynamic team of energetic, passionate, and customer-centric members. Our people bring our brands to life and connect with our customers in order to deliver the best experience.

If you are passionate about food and thrive on perfecting each customer experience whilst working with a world-class team, we would love to get to know you!

Outlet Manager / Assistant Manager
Stall / Kitchen Assistants
Noodle Chefs
Assistant Cooks
Cashiers
Coffee Chef
Cleaners
View Openings

title: Fei Siong Group - Taiwan Night Markets
html:
Skip to content
Home
About
Brands
Careers
News

Search for:
 
Our Brands
Taiwan Night Markets

TaiWan Night Markets serves as a cultural promotion center that showcases Taiwan street food. It aims to introduce iconic Taiwanese cuisines to Singaporeans and visitors from around the world through TaiWan Night Markets, allowing everyone to experience the unique and profound flavors of Taiwan street food. The new concept is the fruit of development efforts by Mr Tan Kim Siong, Chairman of Fei Siong Group, and Mr Chen Chun Lin, CEO of Taiwan Ever Victorious International Co. Ltd, Taiwanese entrepreneur and honorary consultant for Fei Siong Group’s business in Taiwan. Taiwan Night Markets will open its door to everyone at Cineleisure, in the heart of Orchard, on 28 July and we sincerely invite you to experience the delightful taste of Taiwan street food.

title: Kawan Kawan - Fei Siong Group
html:
Skip to content
Home

Search for:
 
Our Brands
Kawan Kawan

Kawan Kawan was born out of a passion for bringing friends and family closer through the joy of food. Our founders envisioned a place where people could embrace diversity, share stories, and create lasting memories over delightful meals. The restaurant’s commitment to quality, authenticity, and hospitality forms the foundation of its identity.
At Kawan Kawan, the main idea is to foster a sense of togetherness among friends and family through the joy of sharing food. The restaurant is designed to be a vibrant and welcoming space that encourages diners to bond over delectable dishes and conversations.


Four Stalls, One Family
Customers can look forward to a diverse range of authentic dishes originating from different countries at our Thai, Local, Western, and Beverage Stalls.

Our Brands
Popeyes

In 2022, Fei Siong Group inked an exclusive franchise deal to develop and run new Popeyes in Singapore. This agreement marks Fei Siong Group’s first venture into the fried chicken quick service restaurant industry.

Serving delicious and flavourful fried chicken, using only fresh chicken marinated for 12 hours in bold spices, then hand-battered and breaded to perfection, we believe in Popeyes’ ethos, to serve delicious fried chicken for everyone.

html:
Skip to content
Home

Search for:
 
Our Brands
SG Hawker

SG Hawker is Fei Siong Group’s take on a modernised kopitiam, while retaining the age-old flavours of popular local street foods that many Singaporeans grew up with. Prepared using heritage recipes passed down through generations, the array of traditional local dishes here include popular favourites such as Chicken Rice, Char Kway Teow and Fishball Noodles. 

Featuring a hip and comfortable dining ambience, SG Hawker is a place to experience an authentic taste of Singapore and its hawker culture.

Outlets:
• Clarke Quay, Blk E #01-08
• Tanglin Mall, #B1-28

title: Fei Siong Group - Ci Yuan Hawker Centre
html:
Skip to content
Home
About
Brands
Careers
News
Contact Us
Search for:
 
Our Brands
Ci Yuan Hawker Centre

Ci Yuan Hawker Centre is managed by Fei Siong Social Enterprise, the social enterprise subsidiary of Fei Siong Group.

Located within Ci Yuan Community Club, the hawker centre is part of a government pledge to build 20 such public dining establishments. Complete with spacious walkways and high ceilings, the hawker centre features 40 cooked food stalls and has a seating capacity of up to 640 pax, ideal to be also used as an event venue.

Ci Yuan Hawker Centre is also a showcase for Fei Siong Social Enterprise’s “Entrepreneurship Programme”, which pairs aspiring hawkers who lack capital and culinary know-how with older generation hawkers who are unable to continue with their trade. In this way, Fei Siong Group provides local entrepreneurs with the opportunity to operate their own cooked food stalls and encourages the preservation of Singapore’s local hawker heritage.

www.ciyuanhawker.com.sg

Our Brands
Sedap Noodle

Customers can enjoy Fei Siong’s well-loved noodle dishes at Sedap Noodle stalls conveniently located in coffee shops. Dishing up fishball noodles, wanton noodles and laksa, this Halal-certified chain promises consistently tasty, satisfying meals that offer great value – ideal for everyday dining.

title: Fei Siong Group - Ding Ji
html:

Home

Search for:
 
Our Brands
Ding Ji

The Ding Ji brand is a household name in Singapore, with a chain of over 50 stalls located in coffee shops islandwide.

Ding Ji’s specialty is its Teochew-style noodle dishes; cooked to order with the customer’s choice of noodles, condiments and other toppings. Popular variations include bak chor mee (noodles with minced pork and mushrooms) and fishball noodles, typically cooked with flat or thin yellow egg noodles (colloquially referred to as mee pok and mee kia). Ding Ji is also well-known for its immensely popular fish maw soup and laksa.

Our Brands
Nam Kee Pau

Nam Kee Pau is a famous steamed bun specialty brand originating from Johor Bahru, Malaysia. Following the chain’s proprietary secret recipe, all buns are freshly handmade daily and feature a variety of sumptuous fillings.

Customers can also pick up other steamed snacks such as glutinous rice and siew mai (pork dumplings), or tuck into noodle dishes (at select outlets). Especially popular are the hand-torn mee hoon kuay and ke kou mian – cooked a la minute and served piping hot.

Our Brands
Hong Kong Egglet

Bringing a taste of Hong Kong to our shores, Hong Kong Egglet is a chain of food kiosks peddling gai daan zai (egg waffles) that are freshly-made using a traditional secret recipe obtained from a well-established egglet vendor in Hong Kong.

Besides the Original egglet with its iconic “bubble” texture and toasty flavour, Hong Kong Egglet also offers unique variations of the classic. such as Pizza, Chicken Floss and Spicy Shrimp, as well as timeless favourites – Chocolate, Pandan and Strawberry.

html:

Our Brands
EAT.

EAT. was introduced in 2006 to capitalise on the success of Fei Siong Group, which was fast cementing its reputation as a purveyor of local food in the F&B business scene.

Conveniently located in suburban and city centre malls, EAT. is one of the first local F&B brands to take hawker food out of hawker centres and venture into shopping centres as a standalone specialty outlet, instead. Its cosy, eat-and-go concept appeals to diners seeking quick and fuss-free meals at affordable prices. Here, customers can savour local traditional fare, such as bak chor mee (minced pork noodles), fishball noodles, laksa, and an array of fried snacks.

title: Fei Siong Group - 85 Redhill Teochew Fishball Noodles
html:
Skip to content

Our Brands
85 Redhill

85 Redhill Teochew Fishball Noodles is the predecessor of Fei Siong Group as the original stall in Redhill Close belonged to the grandfather of Mr Tan Kim Siong, the Chairman of Fei Siong Group.

This is now a chain of speciality food establishments comprising 6 specialty eateries and 1 stall located at Fei Siong at Tangs Market. As reflected in its name, it specialises in Teochew-style fishball noodles with traditional flavour and taste.

At 85 Redhill Teochew Fishball Noodles, you can savour tasty noodles with a chewy bite, served with delicious Teochew fishballs, meatballs and fishcakes that are handmade using yellowtail fish. The signature fishballs are well-loved for their light, bouncy texture and fresh flavours.

Tangs Market

Situated in the basement of Tang Plaza, Tangs Market brings a dose of nostalgic flavour to the sleek and glamorous shopping vicinity that is Orchard Road. The themed food court offers a myriad of tantalising local and Malaysian hawker dishes that are a hit with tourists, shoppers and workers in the area. Prices are also attractive and affordable, so it is not wonder that Tangs Market sees a bustling crowd of visitors every day, all year round.

title: Fei Siong Group - Malaysia Boleh!
html:
Skip to content
Home
About
Brands
Careers
News

Search for:
 
Our Brands
Malaysia Boleh!

Convening some of the best Malaysian street hawker fare under one roof, Malaysia Boleh! is the go-to dining destination for those who want a taste of Malaysia without crossing the Straits.

Malaysia Boleh! is the result of a country-wide scour, featuring big-name specialties such as Penang Jalan Cheong Fatt Tze prawn noodles soup, Petaling Street famous claypot rice and Klang Bak Kut Teh. All the dishes served in this self-operated food atrium are prepared following time-honoured secret recipes handed down from top-rated Malaysian street hawkers, thus ensuring authentic flavours that are true to the original.

Decked with vintage pushcarts and signboards, and decorated to mimic rows of old shophouses, the food atrium exudes the vibe of Malaysian streets circa 1960s. Combining taste and ambience, Malaysia Boleh! is a must-visit for a destination-themed dining experience filled with vibrancy and variety.

www.malaysiaboleh.com.sg

Fei Siong Group’s latest food concept Boleh Boleh! Singapore celebrates hawker culture and Singapore’s multicultural identity. title: Fei Siong Group - Find out all about us
html:
Skip to content
Home
About
Brands
Careers
News
Contact Us
Search for:
 
Who we are
Fei Siong Group A leading homegrown food service company

Because at Fei Siong, we preserve tradition by perfecting our customers’ experience with authentic and affordable hawker food

Founded in 1995 by Mr Tan Kim Siong, Chairman of Fei Siong Group, the Group made its first foray into the F&B scene with its pioneer stall selling fishball noodles in a hawker centre outside the former National Library at Stamford Road. Today, Fei Siong Group has grown to become an established casual dining and quick service restaurant company with over 150 outlets across 19 brands in Singapore. As a constant forerunner in the ever-changing landscape of the food services industry, the Group is committed to delivering authentic and quality local dishes at affordable prices to our customers.

Our Vision
We aim to be the leading Singapore-owned Food & Beverage group serving quality and affordable local hawker fare to
the world.
Our Mission
We are dedicated to serving our customers quality Singaporean and Malaysian cuisines at great value.
Our History

Founded in 1995 by Mr Tan Kim Siong, Chairman of Fei Siong Group, the Group made its first foray into the F&B scene with its pioneer stall selling fishball noodles in a hawker centre outside the former National Library at Stamford Road. Today, Fei Siong Group is one of Singapore’s casual dining and quick service restaurant company with 19 brands and over 150 outlets. As a constant forerunner in the ever-changing landscape of the food services industry, the Group is committed to deliver authentic and quality local dishes at affordable prices to our customers.

Our Culture

We believe in our people. And cultivating a growth mindset has helped us to achieve great things. At Fei Siong, our culture of staying committed to bringing our customers the best experience is deeply rooted across levels. Through an inclusive and honest environment, we strive to bring out the best in our people.

Our Core Values
Accountability

We are committed to being responsible in what we do.

Agility

We adapt to change and innovate for growth.

Integrity

We ensure we are always doing the right thing.

Passion to succeed

We have an unyielding drive to succeed, while remaining humble.

People-focused

We value people and partnerships.

Teamwork

We collaborate to work, learn, and grow as a team.

Our Journey
Innovating Since The Beginning
1995

Mr Tan started from humble beginnings, selling fishball noodles at a rented hawker centre stall just outside the former National Library at Stamford Road.

2006

EAT was a pioneer among F&B hawker brands, operating in retail malls as a standalone outlet.

2012

Launched Malaysia Boleh! as a new business model – the self-operated food atrium, successfully positioning it as a thematic dining attraction offering an elevated food atrium dining experience.

2014

Expanded our footprint in the F&B landscape with the launch of Nam Kee Pau, the famous steamed bun speciality from Johor Bahru.

2014

Birth of the first Halal-certified mini food atrium concept. Encik Tan provides authentic Chinese hawker fare using Halal ingredients.

2015

Showcased a new alternative management model for hawker centres through Fei Siong Social Enterprise’s “Entrepreneurship Programme” at Ci Yuan Hawker Centre.

2017

Malaysia Boleh! is named Honorary Partner by Tourism Malaysia. Malaysia Boleh! is proud to be Tourism Malaysia's F&B partner, promoting Malaysia through its Malaysian hawker food and flavours.

2018

Implemented the use of an Eco-Safe Digester at Ci Yuan Hawker Centre to convert food waste into non-potable water.

2020

Awarded the SkillsFuture Employer Award as we embarked on the path of digital literacy

2020

Fei Siong Group clinches 25th spot in 2020 Enterprise 50 Award.

2021

A celebration of hawker culture and Singapore's multi-cultural identity with 10,000 sq ft of local and regional hawker delights.

2021

GREAT. is a brand new concept at heartland coffeeshops serving local and international cuisines, bringing GREAT.Food to you everyday.

2021

Sabai Sabai Thai Food brings you authentic and quality Thai delicacies at affordable prices.

2022

Fei Siong Group inks exclusive franchise deal to develop and run new Popeyes in Singapore.

Engaging The Community

At the heart of the organisation, we believe in staying true to the virtues of giving back to society. As the Group succeeds in its endeavours, it embarks on new initiatives to provide community support.

Management Team

From left to right: Tan Kim Leng (Executive Director), Tan Kim Beng (Director), Tan Kim Siong (Chairman), New Mun Kit (Director)

title: Fei Siong Group - Serving authentic hawker food with a taste of nostalgia at affordable prices
html:
Skip to content
Home
About
Brands
Careers
News
Contact Us
Search for:
 
Landing

Serving Authentic Hawker Food
with a taste of Nostalgia at Affordable prices

History

1995

The flagship stall by Fei Siong Group was set up outside the former National Library at Stamford Library.

Dingji

55 Outlets

We honed our craft.

Expanding the Fei Siong brand and operated coffeeshop stalls all over Singapore before rebranding into
Ding Ji.

EAT

22 Outlets

As one of the first food shops to enter retail malls, our foray with food shops was a huge success.

MalaysiaBoleh

3 Outlets

Birth of our first Malaysian food street serving up authentic recipes curated from top-rated hawkers across Malaysia.

Brands

From 2012, the Group expanded its footprint in the F&B landscape,
securing its position as a key player in the market.

Ci yuan

In 2015, we turned our attention to giving back to the community.

Becoming one of the first social enterprise to operate Ci Yuan Hawker Centre with an Entrepreneurship programme.

CSR

While making sure we also reach a wider community through other initiatives.

Partnering with The Food Bank Singapore to help feed those impacted by Covid-19

Hosting beneficiaries to “Have a Meal on Encik Tan with PPIS” at Marina Square

training

As a Group, we recognise the need for continual training of the company’s greatest assets to keep itself abreast of competition.

Embarking on a Job Redesign Place and Train programme to upskill our staff in digitalisation

Conducting Approved in-house Training Organisation (ATO) for WSQ courses

Staff

To date, the Group remains dedicated to its mission of serving its customers with a hearty portion of quality Singaporean and Malaysian cuisines at great value.

We currently manage 15 brands in more than 150 outlets island wide with 1,600 employees.

We are Fei Siong

Founded in 1995 by Mr Tan Kim Siong, Chairman of Fei Siong Group, the Group made its first foray into the F&B scene with its pioneer stall selling fishball noodles in a hawker centre outside the former National Library at Stamford Road. Today, Fei Siong Group is one of Singapore’s casual dining and quick service restaurant company with 19 brands and over 150 outlets. As a constant forerunner in the ever-changing landscape of the food services industry, the Group is committed to deliver authentic and quality local dishes at affordable prices to our customers.

Engaging The Community

At the heart of the organisation, we believe in staying true to the virtues of giving back to society. As the Group succeeds in its endeavours, it embarks on new initiatives to provide community support.

Join Us Today!

It’s time to step into your new future in the food industry. Join our dedicated team that constantly challenge themselves to reach for greater heights and realise your potential today!
